page.title: 08Local News (cont)
page.content: Cancer Research.It was from Dinnington Comprehensive and back to Dinnington Comprehensive.The runners ran 6 miles around the road of Dinnington and Anston. Around 2,000 people took part. The Fun run was for both young people and old people.The money was raised by getting sponsers for running the full distance. It was raining a bit but the runners still did well. {Burglars in School {Greenlands School}has been burgled. Burglars got in through a window in Class 1. The shop money was taken, baking money and a collection for Mr.} Fretwell, the head master, who is leaving this summer.The police came for finger prints and they found what they wanted.They think they know who the thieves are.
